statements.insert: merge into FB_USER_INFO as a using (values(#UserId#)) as Params(UserId) on a.ID = #UserId# WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET created = getdate() ,modified = getdate() WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ID ,user_name ) VALUES ( #UserId# ,#DisplayName# ) ;

insert into FB_USER_INFO ( ID, user_name ) select #UserId# as id, #DisplayName# as name where not exists ( select 'x' from FB_USER_INFO a where a.ID = #UserId# ) ;
select @@rowcount as value
